backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor placeholder with no logic implemented.
feature_evidence.json: Contains feature evidence metadata linking landing screen changes to specific features and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides high-level summaries of all frontend files including screens, hooks, utilities, and styles.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining light/dark mode color tokens and global styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling theme/i18n/auth providers and screen navigation with route guards.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Wrapper layout that centers content and constrains width to 500px.
frontend/src/components/TopBar.tsx: Top navigation bar with branding, language selector, theme toggle, and logout when authenticated.
LocalStorage/session-based authentication provider handling login, signup, session restore, and logout.
frontend/src/features/generation/generat: Type definitions for caricature generation input and result structures.
frontend/src/features/generation/useCari: Hook simulating caricature generation, storing results, and managing generation state and errors.
frontend/src/features/i18n/i18n.ts: Translation dictionary mapping keys to strings across ten languages.
frontend/src/features/i18n/useI18n.tsx: Provides a React context for language selection and translation, persisting the chosen language in localStorage.
frontend/src/features/payment/razorpayPl: Contains a mock Razorpay initializer that warns and returns a placeholder if no key is configured.
frontend/src/features/payment/useMockPay: Implements a fake payment hook that simulates processing and stores a paid flag in localStorage.
frontend/src/features/pricing/useRegiona: Determines regional pricing via IP lookup or cache and returns formatted price info.
frontend/src/features/theme/useTheme.tsx: Provides a theme context with light/dark mode toggling stored in localStorage and applied to the DOM.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity login state, identity loading, and AuthClient configuration in a React context.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind-based global styles including light/dark theme variables and smooth UI transitions.
frontend/src/lib/downloadPng.ts: Downloads images as PNG, converting SVG sources to PNG via canvas when needed.
frontend/src/lib/storage.ts: Provides safe JSON-based localStorage helpers for get, set, and remove operations.
frontend/src/lib/uiStyles.ts: Exports reusable Tailwind style strings for cards, buttons, inputs, and labels.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the main App.
frontend/src/screens/AuthScreen.tsx: Implements a login/signup UI with local auth, translations, and styled form components including Google redirect.
Form screen collecting user details and art style, then showing a mock payment step and triggering caricature generation on success.
frontend/src/screens/LandingScreen.tsx: Landing page showing app branding, example images, hero image, and a Get Started button.
frontend/src/screens/ResultScreen.tsx: Displays the generated caricature with user metadata and offers PNG downloading or starting a new attempt.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, radius, animations, and enabling plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing the CaricatureMe MVP architecture, features, requirements, and known issues.
